rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: The entrance hall welcomes guests. It is designed with ample space to display decor elements, following Vastu principles by aligning the door with auspicious directions.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: A combined open-plan living and dining area that fosters a vibrant social environment. Windows are strategically placed for natural lighting and ventilation, enhancing comfort and energy efficiency.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: The kitchen is functional with modern amenities, designed to follow Vastu guidelines by placing the sink in the north-east direction for water benefits.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious guest bedroom located in an auspicious area to ensure relaxation and comfort during visits. Natural lighting is maximized.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom features a private balcony with views, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu recommendations for the head of the household.

rooms.name: Bathroom 1 (Guest)
rooms.description: Adjacent to guest bedroom. Designed compactly while incorporating necessary fixtures in compliance with local norms.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office space designed on the eastern side of the floor, aligning with Vastu for productivity and positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Industrial Loft / Workshop Area
rooms.description: An industrial-style loft area that serves as a multipurpose workspace, following local design norms for functional spaces in a cottage setting.

openings.description: A large entrance door ensuring easy access. Placed to welcome positive energy and designed with Vastu principles in mind.
Multiple windows across living, dining areas and bedrooms ensure natural light and ventilation while aligning with local norms and Vastu guidelines.
Sliding glass doors connecting indoor-outdoor spaces to allow flexibility between the home office and the terrace or garden area.
An accessible entrance from the ground floor leading directly to a swimming pool, designed to be part of recreational outdoor space.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: A secondary bedroom with ample storage and natural light. Its placement adheres to Vastu guidelines for restful sleep.

rooms.name: Bathroom 2
rooms.description: The second-floor bathroom is designed with modern fixtures, ensuring privacy and convenience.

openings.description: A well-designed staircase connecting the ground and first floor, ensuring safe and compliant circulation as per local building codes.
A balcony attached to the master bedroom, offering a private outdoor space. It follows Vastu guidelines for enhancing personal wellbeing.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A rooftop home theater integrated into the roof garden design, providing an elevated cinematic experience with controlled acoustics and privacy.

openings.description: An access door from the ground floor to the roof garden ensures connectivity while maintaining energy efficiency and safety.
Roof windows designed for natural ventilation and lighting, enhancing the ambiance of the home theater area in accordance with local norms.
